Name: Grudge
Effect: Single Target. The User Faints. Reduce the Target's Will to 0 and reset any Effects it got from spending Will Points. Roll Target's Loyalty at the end of the round; increase difficulty by 1 each round. Failing this roll faints the Target.
Description: The user leaves an imprinting grudge on the foe; this makes the target unwilling to fight. It may only keep battling if something greater is at risk.
